query:
SELECT 
  s.id,
  s.blingOrderId,
  p.name as produto,
  s.quantity,
  s.unitPrice / 100.0 as preco_unitario,
  s.totalPrice / 100.0 as preco_total,
  s.orderStatus,
  s.saleDate
FROM sales s
JOIN products p ON s.productId = p.id
ORDER BY s.saleDate DESC
LIMIT 10;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2JcS2SMt4kXiaZg.root --database e5hjdPqiFqSfQ5APk99tn8 --execute SELECT 
  s.id,
  s.blingOrderId,
  p.name as produto,
  s.quantity,
  s.unitPrice / 100.0 as preco_unitario,
  s.totalPrice / 100.0 as preco_total,
  s.orderStatus,
  s.saleDate
FROM sales s
JOIN products p ON s.productId = p.id
ORDER BY s.saleDate DESC
LIMIT 10;
